title: Neural Drift - 25 Min Ambient Focus Music | Pravos Deep Work Sessions
description:
Experience Neural Drift - a 25-minute ambient journey designed for deep concentration and creative flow.

This is part of Pravos (www.pravos.xyz), a minimalist focus workspace I built after years of juggling separate apps for music, timers, and task lists. One clean interface. One purpose: helping you sink into deep work.

Each Pravos album is a 25-minute arc: gentle settling, rising focus, sustained peak, soft landing. The pattern mirrors ecstatic dance practice - enough movement to carry you, never enough to pull your attention.

Try Pravos: www.pravos.xyz
